resources.string:
Periodical 0.13

Calculation of fertility according to Knaus–Ogino

WARNING: It is not recommended to use this calendar to avoid pregnancy! There are more accurate methods, like measuring the basal body temperature.

You can change the month using the buttons or by swiping to the left or to the right.

To indicate the first day of the period, just tap the day in the calendar. To remove the entry, tap again.

Colors indicate the meaning of a day:

Red – Days of the period.

Blue – Fertile days.

Yellow – Infertile days.

The calculated day of ovulation is marked with an O. The current day is marked with a circle.

The calculation is done for two cycles in advance.

If you tap on an entry in the list, the corresponding month is displayed in the calendar.

To use the data backup, a memory card or internal memory must be present.
Do you want to backup the current data?\nThis will replace the last backup!
Do you want to restore the last backup?\nThis will replace the current data!
Mark this day as \"Period has started\"?
Remove the \"Period has started\" mark for this day?
